Metrics module

Script that defines the metrics which are used to evaluate the model

metrics.F1(pre, rec)

calculate F1 score

Parameters:

  • pre – precision

  • rec – recall

Returns:

F1 score

Return type:

float

metrics.average_precision(r, cut)

calculate average precision

Parameters:

  • r – list of relevance scores (either 1 or 0)

  • cut – number of results to consider

Returns:

average precision

Return type:

float

metrics.calculate_auc(ground_truth, prediction)

calculate AUC score

Parameters:

  • ground_truth – ground truth

  • prediction – prediction

Returns:

AUC score

Return type:

float

metrics.dcg_at_k(r, k, method=1)

calculate discounted cumulative gain at k

Parameters:

  • r – list of relevance scores (either 1 or 0)

  • k – number of results to consider

  • method – method to calculate dcg

Returns:

discounted cumulative gain at k

Return type:

float

metrics.get_auc(item_score, user_pos_test)

Get the area under the curve

Parameters:

  • item_score (dict) – items scores

  • user_pos_test (list) – user positive items in the test set

Returns:

auc

Return type:

float

metrics.get_performance(r, auc, user_pos_test, Ks)

Get the performance of the model

Parameters:

  • r (list) – model relevant items

  • auc (float) – area under the curve

  • user_pos_test (list) – user positive items in the test set

  • Ks (list) – list of Ks

Returns:

metrics values

Return type:

dict

metrics.hit_at_k(r, k)

calculate hit at k

Parameters:

  • r – list of relevance scores (either 1 or 0)

  • k – number of results to consider

Returns:

hit at k

Return type:

float

metrics.mean_average_precision(rs)

calculate mean average precision

Parameters:

rs – list of relevance scores (either 1 or 0)

Returns:

mean average precision

Return type:

float

metrics.ndcg_at_k(r, k, method=1)

calculate normalized discounted cumulative gain at k

Parameters:

  • r – list of relevance scores (either 1 or 0)

  • k – number of results to consider

  • method – method to calculate dcg

Returns:

normalized discounted cumulative gain at k

Return type:

float

metrics.precision_at_k(r, k)

calculate precision at k

Parameters:

  • r – list of relevance scores (either 1 or 0)

  • k – number of results to consider

Returns:

precision at k

Return type:

float

metrics.rank_list_by_heapq(user_pos_test, test_items, rating, Ks)

Rank the list by heapq

Parameters:

  • rating (dict) – model predicted ratings

  • user_pos_test (list) – user positive items in the test set

  • test_items – test items

Returns:

r, auc

Return type:

list, float

metrics.rank_list_by_sorted(user_pos_test, test_items, rating, Ks)

Rank the list by sorted

Parameters:

  • rating (dict) – model predicted ratings

  • user_pos_test (list) – user positive items in the test set

  • test_items (list) – test items

  • Ks (list) – list of Ks

Returns:

model relevant items, auc

Return type:

list, float

metrics.recall(rank, ground_truth, N)

calculate recall

Parameters:

  • rank (list) – ranked list

  • ground_truth (list) – ground truth list

  • N (int) – number of items to consider

Returns:

recall

Return type:

float

metrics.recall_at_k(r, k, all_pos_num)

calculate recall at k

Parameters:

  • r – list of relevance scores (either 1 or 0)

  • k – number of results to consider

  • all_pos_num – number of all positive samples

Returns:

recall at k

Return type:

float
